mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shequ(title, details, userid) VALUES(#{title}, #{details}, #{userid})
mapper.update: UPDATE shequ SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.title, u.name FROM shequ s JOIN user u ON s.userid = u.id
SELECT s.*, u.name, u.avatar FROM shequ s JOIN user u ON s.userid = u.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
